div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1488 Al-Mina, 1936 Burial: c. 375 B.C. (Robinson) Contents: 43 AR. From excavations; found with jewelry Athens and imit.: 26 tetradr. Aradus: 6 ob. Sidon: 9 1/16 shekels Unc. mints: 2 fr. Disposition: London For references see no. 1486 above
